text: María Del Mar Olmedo Justicia (born August 10, 1983 in Almería) is a judo athlete from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind and a B3 type athlete. She competed in judo at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. She was the number two judo athlete in the women's + 70 Kilogram group. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Andalusia Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B3
title: María Del Mar Olmedo Justicia
